categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: This converted drone barge was Admiral Mordur's base of operations following the Battle of Endor.

Command codes had been installed to enable an entire convoy of automated drone barges to follow this vessel, carrying massive amounts of valuable ores from Vandelhelm. The Admiral planned to leave the system once the last of Vandelhelm's royal family had been killed.
The plot failed, with all the conspirators killed, and the convoy came into the hands of the Alliance of Free Planets.
